mapper.select: SELECT * FROM orders where week = #{week} AND labnum = #{labnum}

SELECT * FROM orders WHERE u1=#{username} OR u2=#{username} OR u3=#{username} OR u4=#{username} OR u5=#{username} OR u6=#{username} OR u7=#{username} OR u8=#{username} OR u9=#{username} OR u10=#{username} OR u11=#{username} OR u12=#{username}

SELECT * FROM orders WHERE u1 like #{username} OR u2 like #{username} OR u3 like #{username} OR u4 like #{username} OR u5 like #{username} OR u6 like #{username} OR u7 like #{username} OR u8 like #{username} OR u9 like #{username} OR u10 like #{username} OR u11 like #{username} OR u12 like #{username}
select * FROM orders where week BETWEEN #{week1} and #{week2} or week BETWEEN #{week2} and #{week1} AND labnum = #{labnum}
